snippet: RedPrairie agreed on Thursday to buy JDA Software for $1.9 billion in cash, combining two firms that make software that helps companies manage their supply chains.
abstract: RedPrairie agreed on Thursday to buy JDA Software for $1.9 billion in cash, combining two firms that make software that helps companies manage their supply chains.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: RedPrairie to Buy JDA Software for $1.9 Billion
